QC.description: Computed with CollectInsertSizeMetrics, it's an inferred insert size based on the mapping location of the reads.
Assessed via 3' bias index, dividing the number of reads mapped to 3' exons by the number of reads mapped to all exons
QC.reference: Wenying P, Quake SR, Altman R, Blumenfeld Y, and Stevenson D. 2016. Development of Diagnostic Methods UsingCell-Free Nucleic Acids

QC.description: Assessed via intron-to-exon ratio, by dividing the number of reads mapped to all introns by the number of reads mapped to all exons
QC.reference: Wenying P, Quake SR, Altman R, Blumenfeld Y, and Stevenson D. 2016. Development of Diagnostic Methods UsingCell-Free Nucleic Acids

QC.description: Computed comparing the reads that map to known ribosomal sequences with the total number of reads for a given sample, using the gtf annotation
QC.reference: Moufarrej, Mira N., Ronald J. Wong, Gary M. Shaw, David K. Stevenson, and Stephen R. Quake. 2020. Investigating Pregnancy and Its Complications Using Circulating Cell-Free RNA in Womenâ€™s Blood During Gestation. Frontiers in Pediatrics 8.

QC.description: Percentage of duplicates, computed using the MarkDuplicates function after q10 filter
Percentage of duplicates, computed dividing the difference between the properly paired reads before and after removing duplicates with MarkDuplicates by the total number of reads
Percentage of reads assigned without ambiguity to a genomic feature
